metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18897 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Poppler 0.71.0. There is a memory leak in GfxColorSpace::setDisplayProfile in GfxState.cc, as demonstrated by pdftocairo.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18897` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.9
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.9
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.9
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.9
libpoppler73 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.9
poppler-utils - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.62.0-2ubuntu2.9').
